author: geirm
msg: The launcher parses "harmonyvm.properties" into a buffer of fixed size and without boundaries checking.
If the file has more than 20 lines with VM arguments, segfault occurs.
1) Robust file parsing with any EOLs;
3) Added support for %VM_DIR% tokens, now easy to add any others;
4) Command-line "-Xbootclasspath:" option now really overrides whole BCP.
Also removed some unused parameters from internal declarations.
Ubuntu 6 - tested w/ DRLVM smoke, c-unit and ~kernel.  j9+classlib tests work too
